attributes.action: Restore capital punishment via public execution for rapists/murderers
attributes.additional_details:
Prison is no longer a deterrent and offers comfort, prisons are offering better life than Middle East, proof in reoffending.

reinstate public executions for convictions since 2000. 

Amend Human Rights Act 1998 & related laws to allow forfeiture of rights for rapists/murderers. Withdraw from ECHR Protocols 6/13 if needed. Broadcast on BBC for max deterrence.

This restores justice, deters crime, saves billions, stabilises society amid uncertainty, and rebuilds citizen trust in law enforcement.
attributes.background: Due to rising rape & murder rates, immediate threats to life, uncontrolled immigration straining safety, unchecked grooming gangs, high prison costs reinstate public executions for convictions since 2000. Broadcast on BBC for deterrence & justice. This stabilises society amid uncertainty.
